thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses Canada reviewed by Shir Tar

author: Shir Tar
title: Shir Tar
text: Everything went smoothly. I was a bit skeptical ordering prescription frame online but i am sold on the idea now. it did take few days more than what i expected but inquiry email respond was prompt with details. Product is exactly how it was described and quality is good as well so i will be buying again since you cant beat the pricing compared to other retailers for same product. Thanks
